entities.name: dementor
entities.description: A creature that is described as standing and looking around, with a face that cannot be seen. It is mentioned to have been present in the room.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is scared and thinks Harry is having a fit.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends who describes what happened when Professor Lupin stepped over Harry.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: A professor who steps over Harry and walks towards the dementor with his wand.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Someone that Professor Lupin is telling the dementor to leave alone.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who describes how cold it got when the dementor came in.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is having a fit and being talked about by his friends.

relationships.description: Professor Lupin walked towards the dementor.
Lupin cast a silvery thing at the dementor.
Hermione mentioned Sirius Black's name when Professor Lupin told the dementor to leave him alone.
Neville experienced how cold it got when the dementor came in.
Ron was concerned about Harry's fit.
